mapper.select: SELECT u.USER_ID as userId, u.name, k.KAISYA_NAME_JPN as companyName, s.SOSHIKI_NAME_JPN as organizationName, u.KENGEN_KUBUN as kengenKubun FROM User u LEFT JOIN kaisya_mst k ON u.KAISYA_CODE = k.KAISYA_CODE LEFT JOIN taisyo_soshiki s ON u.SOSHIKI_CODE = s.SOSHIKI_CODE WHERE u.USER_ID = #{userId}
